column4: Hello, everyone. Is there a command I should issue at the terminal or a package/software that I have to download for me to know what my broadband/DSL speed is? Thanks!
it's very hard to get that kind of info from just your computer.. it's far easier to just check the bill/contract
The problem is that, I heard a rumour that while we are supposed to have 1 Mbps, we're only actually enjoying (?) about 500 kbps
try those online speed sites.. or download a big file from someone with a much faster connection than you have
